text: Josef Abrhám (14 December 1939 – 16 May 2022) was a Czech movie and theatre actor. He was born in Zlín, Czechslovakia. He is known for his stage performances with The Drama Club in Prague. Abrhám was married to actress Libuše Šafránková until her death in 2021. He died in Prague, Czech Republic on 16 May 2022 from Parkinson's disease-related problems, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech stage actors Category:Czech television actors Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease
title: Josef Abrhám
